beer.beer_description: Back when the Four Four Three started building trails, POD was the Sticky Forrest OG jump line.  To honor this trail we’ve created a big sticky, dank, resinous beast, of an old school IPA. Named Pedal or Die for good reason - you better pedal fast, so this is well deserved.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 40 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 9! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 50 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 11!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 460 distinct venues!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 430 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 87!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 10 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 3.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 140 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 29!

user.bio: Verveling?Luister anders naar de biervriendenpodcast voor een ongefilterde mening over speciaalbier.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 5! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 95 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 20!
